roleset.name: remove the sugar entity from a glycogen (but especially from a glycoprotein)

example.name: example with intentional agent
example.text: Therefore, we deglycosylated human recombinant dimeric eA5 and tested on GBM cells.

example.name: example with instrument
example.text: In initial studies, bovine or human TSH preparations were deglycosylated with anhydrous hydrogen fluoride or trifluoromethanesulfonic acid (137-139).
example.arg: anhydrous hydrogen fluoride or trifluoromethanesulfonic acid

example.name: example with result
example.text: Receptors were solubilized, immunoprecipitated, and deglycosylated from 2 mg of membrane protein, and blotted with each of these antibodies.
